attempts.mcp_query: EVALUATE ROW("Result", SUM(Sales[Net Price]))
EVALUATE ROW("Result", COUNTROWS(Customer))
EVALUATE ROW("Result", AVERAGE(Sales[Unit Price]))
EVALUATE ROW("Result", DISTINCTCOUNT(Sales[ProductKey]))
EVALUATE ROW("Result", SUM(Sales[Quantity]))
EVALUATE ROW("Result", TOTALYTD([Total Sales], Date[Date]))
EVALUATE ROW("Result", CALCULATE([Total Sales], SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR(Date[Date])))
EVALUATE ROW("Result", CALCULATE([Total Sales], Product[Category] = "Audio"))

results.title: Year-over-Year Growth Percentage

attempts.expression:
VAR CurrentYearSales = CALCULATE([Total Net Price], SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR(Date[Date]))
VAR PreviousYearSales = CALCULATE([Total Net Price], SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR(Date[Date]), DATEADD(Date[Date], -1, YEAR))
RETURN
IF(
    PreviousYearSales = 0,
    BLANK(),
    DIVIDE(CurrentYearSales - PreviousYearSales, PreviousYearSales)
)
attempts.mcp_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Result", VAR CurrentYearSales = CALCULATE([Total Net Price], SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR(Date[Date]))
VAR PreviousYearSales = CALCULATE([Total Net Price], SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR(Date[Date]), DATEADD(Date[Date], -1, YEAR))
RETURN
IF(
    PreviousYearSales = 0,
    BLANK(),
    DIVIDE(CurrentYearSales - PreviousYearSales, PreviousYearSales)
))

results.final_expression:
VAR CurrentYearSales = CALCULATE([Total Net Price], SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR(Date[Date]))
VAR PreviousYearSales = CALCULATE([Total Net Price], SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR(Date[Date]), DATEADD(Date[Date], -1, YEAR))
RETURN
IF(
    PreviousYearSales = 0,
    BLANK(),
    DIVIDE(CurrentYearSales - PreviousYearSales, PreviousYearSales)
)

results.title: Running Total with CALCULATE and FILTER

attempts.expression:
CALCULATE(
    TOTALMTD([Total Net Price], Date[Date]),
    FILTER(
        ALL(Date),
        YEAR(Date[Date]) = YEAR(MAX(Date[Date]))
    )
)
attempts.mcp_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Result", CALCULATE(
    TOTALMTD([Total Net Price], Date[Date]),
    FILTER(
        ALL(Date),
        YEAR(Date[Date]) = YEAR(MAX(Date[Date]))
    )
))

results.final_expression:
CALCULATE(
    TOTALMTD([Total Net Price], Date[Date]),
    FILTER(
        ALL(Date),
        YEAR(Date[Date]) = YEAR(MAX(Date[Date]))
    )
)

attempts.mcp_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Result", SUMMARIZE(
    Sales,
    Product[Category],
    "Total Sales", [Total Sales]
))

results.title: Product List with Renamed Columns

    "Name", Product[Product Name],
    "Brand", Product[Brand],
    "Product Category", Product[Category]
)
attempts.mcp_query:

results.final_expression:

results.title: Union of High-Value Transactions

attempts.expression:
UNION(
    FILTER(Sales, Sales[Net Price] > 1000),
    FILTER(Sales, Sales[Quantity] > 10)
)
attempts.mcp_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Result", UNION(
    FILTER(Sales, Sales[Net Price] > 1000),
    FILTER(Sales, Sales[Quantity] > 10)
))

results.final_expression:
UNION(
    FILTER(Sales, Sales[Net Price] > 1000),
    FILTER(Sales, Sales[Quantity] > 10)
)

attempts.mcp_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Result", CROSSJOIN(
    VALUES(Date[Year]),
    VALUES(Product[Category])
))

results.title: Product Percentage of Category Total

attempts.expression:
DIVIDE(
    CALCULATE(
        [Total Sales],
        ALL(Product)
    ),
    CALCULATE(
        [Total Sales],
        ALLEXCEPT(Product, Product[Category])
    ),
    0
) * 100
attempts.mcp_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Result", DIVIDE(
    CALCULATE(
        [Total Sales],
        ALL(Product)
    ),
    CALCULATE(
        [Total Sales],
        ALLEXCEPT(Product, Product[Category])
    ),
    0
) * 100)

results.final_expression:
DIVIDE(
    CALCULATE(
        [Total Sales],
        ALL(Product)
    ),
    CALCULATE(
        [Total Sales],
        ALLEXCEPT(Product, Product[Category])
    ),
    0
) * 100

results.title: Virtual Relationship with TREATAS

attempts.expression:
VAR CurrentYear = SELECTEDVALUE(Date[Year])
VAR BudgetAmount = CALCULATE(SUM(Budget[Budget Amount]), TREATAS(VALUES(Date[Year]), Budget[Year]))
RETURN [Total Sales] - BudgetAmount
attempts.mcp_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Result", VAR CurrentYear = SELECTEDVALUE(Date[Year])
VAR BudgetAmount = CALCULATE(SUM(Budget[Budget Amount]), TREATAS(VALUES(Date[Year]), Budget[Year]))
RETURN [Total Sales] - BudgetAmount)

results.final_expression:
VAR CurrentYear = SELECTEDVALUE(Date[Year])
VAR BudgetAmount = CALCULATE(SUM(Budget[Budget Amount]), TREATAS(VALUES(Date[Year]), Budget[Year]))
RETURN [Total Sales] - BudgetAmount

results.title: Granularity-Aware Measure with VALUES

attempts.expression:
IF(
    HASONEVALUE(Date[Year]),
    [Total Net Price],
    CALCULATE(
        AVERAGE(Sales[Net Price]),
        DATESMTD(Date[Date])
    )
)
attempts.mcp_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Result", IF(
    HASONEVALUE(Date[Year]),
    [Total Net Price],
    CALCULATE(
        AVERAGE(Sales[Net Price]),
        DATESMTD(Date[Date])
    )
))

results.final_expression:
IF(
    HASONEVALUE(Date[Year]),
    [Total Net Price],
    CALCULATE(
        AVERAGE(Sales[Net Price]),
        DATESMTD(Date[Date])
    )
)

results.title: Running Count with EARLIER

attempts.expression:

    FILTER(

        Product[Category] = EARLIER(Product[Category])
    ),
    Product[Unit Price],

    DESC,
    DENSE
)

results.title: Percentage of Total with ALLEXCEPT

attempts.expression:
DIVIDE(
    CALCULATE(
        [Total Sales],
        ALL('Product'),
        'Date'[Year] = MAX('Date'[Year])
    ),
    CALCULATE(
        [Total Sales],
        ALL('Product'),
        'Date'[Year] = MAX('Date'[Year])
    ),
    0
)

attempts.mcp_query: EVALUATE ROW("Result", IF(KEEPFILTERS(SELECTEDVALUE(Product[Category]) = "Audio"), [Total Net Price], BLANK()))

results.title: Top 5 Products with TOPN

attempts.expression:
VAR Top5Products = TOPN(5, ALL(Product), [Total Sales], DESC)
RETURN
IF(
    HASONEVALUE(Product[ProductKey]),
    IF(
        Product[ProductKey] IN SELECTCOLUMNS(Top5Products, "ProductKey", Product[ProductKey]),
        [Total Net Price],
        BLANK()
    ),
    BLANK()
)
attempts.mcp_query:
EVALUATE ROW("Result", VAR Top5Products = TOPN(5, ALL(Product), [Total Sales], DESC)
RETURN
IF(
    HASONEVALUE(Product[ProductKey]),
    IF(
        Product[ProductKey] IN SELECTCOLUMNS(Top5Products, "ProductKey", Product[ProductKey]),
        [Total Net Price],
        BLANK()
    ),
    BLANK()
))

results.final_expression:
VAR Top5Products = TOPN(5, ALL(Product), [Total Sales], DESC)
RETURN
IF(
    HASONEVALUE(Product[ProductKey]),
    IF(
        Product[ProductKey] IN SELECTCOLUMNS(Top5Products, "ProductKey", Product[ProductKey]),
        [Total Net Price],
        BLANK()
    ),
    BLANK()
)
